content.question: Which of the following does not describe a sampling method that has a potential source of voluntary response bias for the administration of a survey about college athletics at a university?

choices.label: Giving the survey to 30 students selected at random from each of the eight dorms on campus
Giving the survey to the first 50 students who call the university radio station after the broadcaster announces the survey on air
Giving the survey to any student who stops at a table set up in the student union after the survey is advertised
Giving the survey to all students who respond to an advertisement in the student newspaper
Giving the survey to physical education majors who receive extra credit for completing the survey

content.answer: Giving the survey to 30 students selected at random from each of the eight dorms on campus

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
